summary: A conflict between India and Pakistan resulted in 19 fatalities. There was a positive chance of the conflict escalating to a nuclear level.
Something great happened as Pakistan army head called india to stop the war and look ahead.
Heavy rainfall in Mumbai has led to flooding in several low-lying areas. Commuters are stranded and rescue operations are currently ongoing.
Severe floods have hit northern Bihar, resulting in over 10,000 people being displaced. Relief camps have been set up in schools to provide aid to those affected.
Flash floods in Dubai have caused significant disruption, affecting traffic and leading to the cancellation of dozens of flights. Residents are advised to stay indoors if possible.
A war triggered by trade issues between India and Pakistan resulted in the death of 15 people.

other_details: The war between India and Pakistan has come to an end with a decision to ceasefire.
summary: The war between India and Pakistan has ended with both countries deciding to implement a ceasefire.

other_details: Conflict initiated due to Pakistan hitting different cities in India
summary: War has erupted between India and Pakistan, instigated by Pakistan's attacks on various Indian cities.
